utterances.speaker: TIMPF
utterances.utterance: Furbelly. That's it -- yes, that's what they call me.

utterances.speaker: DEVITO
utterances.utterance: Greg, Greg, you know, who's tall?

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Who?

utterances.speaker: LI
utterances.utterance: Jeanne.

utterances.speaker: DEVITO
utterances.utterance: Jeanne, and look where he is.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Ironic that he's stuck in an elevator. He didn't have to wear elevator shoes growing up, did he? But he's stuck in an elevator. Thank, God. We'll be right back.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: We're out of time. Thanks to Guy Benson, Susan Li, Joe DeVito, Kat Timpf. Where's Jeanne? "FOX NEWS @ NIGHT" with evil Shannon Bream is next. She's not stuck in an elevator.
